verses.verse: These are the words <S%H1697><s%> of the covenant <S%H1285><s%> which Jehovah <S%H3068><s%> commanded <S%H6680><s%> Moses <S%H4872><s%> to make <S%H3772><s%> with the children <S%H1121><s%> of Israel <S%H3478><s%> in the land <S%H776><s%> of Moab <S%H4124><s%>, besides the covenant <S%H1285><s%> which he made <S%H3772><s%> with them in Horeb <S%H2722><s%>.

And Moses <S%H4872><s%> called <S%H7121><s%> unto all Israel <S%H3478><s%>, and said <S%H559><s%> unto them <S%H7200><s%>, Ye have seen all that Jehovah <S%H3068><s%> did <S%H6213><s%> before your eyes <S%H5869><s%> in the land <S%H776><s%> of Egypt <S%H4714><s%> unto Pharaoh <S%H6547><s%>, and unto all his servants <S%H5650><s%>, and unto all his land <S%H776><s%>;
the great <S%H1419><s%> trials <S%H4531><s%> which thine eyes <S%H5869><s%> saw <S%H7200><s%>, the signs <S%H226><s%>, and those great <S%H1419><s%> wonders <S%H4159><s%>:

but Jehovah <S%H3068><s%> hath not given <S%H5414><s%> you a heart <S%H3820><s%> to know <S%H3045><s%>, and eyes <S%H5869><s%> to see <S%H7200><s%>, and ears <S%H241><s%> to hear <S%H8085><s%>, unto this day <S%H3117><s%>.

And I have led <S%H3212><s%> you forty <S%H705><s%> years <S%H8141><s%> in the wilderness <S%H4057><s%>: your clothes <S%H8008><s%> are not waxed old <S%H1086><s%> upon you <S%H5275><s%>, and thy shoe is not waxed old <S%H1086><s%> upon thy foot <S%H7272><s%>.

Ye have not eaten <S%H398><s%> bread <S%H3899><s%>, neither have ye drunk <S%H8354><s%> wine <S%H3196><s%> or strong drink <S%H7941><s%>; that ye may know <S%H3045><s%> that I am Jehovah <S%H3068><s%> your God <S%H430><s%>.

And when ye came <S%H935><s%> unto this place <S%H4725><s%>, Sihon <S%H5511><s%> the king <S%H4428><s%> of Heshbon <S%H2809><s%>, and Og <S%H5747><s%> the king <S%H4428><s%> of Bashan <S%H1316><s%>, came out <S%H3318><s%> against <S%H7125><s%> us unto battle <S%H4421><s%>, and we smote them <S%H5221><s%>:

and we took <S%H3947><s%> their land <S%H776><s%>, and gave <S%H5414><s%> it for an inheritance <S%H5159><s%> unto the Reubenites <S%H7206><s%>, and to the Gadites <S%H1425><s%>, and to the half <S%H2677><s%> - tribe <S%H7626><s%> of the Manassites <S%H4520><s%>.
Keep <S%H8104><s%> therefore the words <S%H1697><s%> of this covenant <S%H1285><s%>, and do <S%H6213><s%> them <S%H7919><s%>, that ye may prosper in all that ye do <S%H6213><s%>.

Ye stand <S%H5324><s%> this day <S%H3117><s%> all of you before <S%H6440><s%> Jehovah <S%H3068><s%> your God <S%H430><s%>; your heads <S%H7218><s%>, your tribes <S%H7626><s%>, your elders <S%H2205><s%>, and your officers <S%H7860><s%>, even all the men <S%H376><s%> of Israel <S%H3478><s%>,

your little ones <S%H2945><s%>, your wives <S%H802><s%>, and thy sojourner <S%H1616><s%> that is in <S%H7130><s%> the midst of thy camps <S%H4264><s%>, from the hewer <S%H2404><s%> of thy wood <S%H6086><s%> unto the drawer <S%H7579><s%> of thy water <S%H4325><s%>;

that thou mayest enter <S%H5674><s%> into the covenant <S%H1285><s%> of Jehovah <S%H3068><s%> thy God <S%H430><s%>, and into his oath <S%H423><s%>, which Jehovah <S%H3068><s%> thy God <S%H430><s%> maketh <S%H3772><s%> with thee this day <S%H3117><s%>;

that he may establish <S%H6965><s%> thee this day <S%H3117><s%> unto himself for a people <S%H5971><s%>, and that he may be unto thee a God <S%H430><s%>, as he spake <S%H1696><s%> unto thee <S%H7650><s%>, and as he sware unto thy fathers <S%H1><s%>, to Abraham <S%H85><s%>, to Isaac <S%H3327><s%>, and to Jacob <S%H3290><s%>.
Neither with you only do I make <S%H3772><s%> this covenant <S%H1285><s%> and this oath <S%H423><s%>,

but with him that standeth <S%H5975><s%> here with us this <S%H3426><s%> day <S%H3117><s%> before <S%H6440><s%> Jehovah <S%H3068><s%> our God <S%H430><s%>, and also with him that is not here with us this day <S%H3117><s%>

(for ye know <S%H3045><s%> how we dwelt <S%H3427><s%> in the land <S%H776><s%> of Egypt <S%H4714><s%>, and how we came <S%H5674><s%> through <S%H7130><s%> the midst of the nations <S%H1471><s%> through which ye passed <S%H7130><s%>;

and ye have seen <S%H7200><s%> their abominations <S%H8251><s%>, and their idols <S%H1544><s%>, wood <S%H6086><s%> and stone <S%H68><s%>, silver <S%H3701><s%> and gold <S%H2091><s%>, which were among them);

lest there should be <S%H3426><s%> among you man <S%H376><s%>, or woman <S%H802><s%>, or family <S%H4940><s%>, or tribe <S%H7626><s%>, whose heart <S%H3824><s%> turneth away <S%H6437><s%> this day <S%H3117><s%> from Jehovah <S%H3068><s%> our God <S%H430><s%>, to go <S%H3212><s%> to serve <S%H5647><s%> the gods <S%H430><s%> of those nations <S%H1471><s%>; lest there should be <S%H3426><s%> among you a root <S%H8328><s%> that beareth <S%H6509><s%> gall <S%H7219><s%> and wormwood <S%H3939><s%>;

and it come to pass <S%H8085><s%>, when he heareth the words <S%H1697><s%> of this curse <S%H423><s%>, that he bless <S%H1288><s%> himself in his heart <S%H3824><s%>, saying <S%H559><s%>, I shall have peace <S%H7965><s%>, though <S%H3588><s%> I walk <S%H3212><s%> in the stubbornness <S%H8307><s%> of my heart <S%H3820><s%>, to destroy <S%H5595><s%> the moist <S%H7302><s%> with the dry <S%H6771><s%>.

Jehovah <S%H3068><s%> will <S%H14><s%> not pardon <S%H5545><s%> him <S%H639><s%>, but then the anger of Jehovah <S%H3068><s%> and his jealousy <S%H7068><s%> will smoke <S%H6225><s%> against that man <S%H376><s%>, and all the curse <S%H423><s%> that is written <S%H3789><s%> in this book <S%H5612><s%> shall lie <S%H7257><s%> upon him <S%H3068><s%>, and Jehovah will blot out <S%H4229><s%> his name <S%H8034><s%> from under heaven <S%H8064><s%>.

And Jehovah <S%H3068><s%> will set him apart <S%H914><s%> unto evil <S%H7451><s%> out of all the tribes <S%H7626><s%> of Israel <S%H3478><s%>, according to all the curses <S%H423><s%> of the covenant <S%H1285><s%> that is written <S%H3789><s%> in this book <S%H5612><s%> of the law <S%H8451><s%>.

And the generation <S%H1755><s%> to come <S%H314><s%>, your children <S%H1121><s%> that shall rise up <S%H6965><s%> after <S%H310><s%> you <S%H5237><s%>, and the foreigner that shall come <S%H935><s%> from a far <S%H7350><s%> land <S%H776><s%>, shall say <S%H559><s%>, when they see <S%H7200><s%> the plagues <S%H4347><s%> of that land <S%H776><s%>, and the sicknesses <S%H8463><s%> wherewith Jehovah <S%H3068><s%> hath made it sick <S%H2470><s%>;

and that the whole land <S%H776><s%> thereof is brimstone <S%H1614><s%>, and salt <S%H4417><s%>, and a burning <S%H8316><s%>, that it is not sown <S%H2232><s%>, nor beareth <S%H6779><s%>, nor any grass <S%H6212><s%> groweth <S%H5927><s%> therein <S%H4114><s%>, like the overthrow of Sodom <S%H5467><s%> and Gomorrah <S%H6017><s%>, Admah <S%H126><s%> and Zeboiim <S%H6636><s%>, which Jehovah <S%H3068><s%> overthrew <S%H2015><s%> in his anger <S%H639><s%>, and in his wrath <S%H2534><s%>:

even all the nations <S%H1471><s%> shall say <S%H559><s%>, Wherefore hath Jehovah <S%H3068><s%> done <S%H6213><s%> thus unto this land <S%H776><s%>? what meaneth the heat <S%H2750><s%> of this great <S%H1419><s%> anger <S%H639><s%>?

Then men shall say <S%H559><s%>, Because they forsook the covenant <S%H1285><s%> of Jehovah <S%H3068><s%>, the God <S%H430><s%> of their fathers <S%H1><s%>, which he made <S%H3772><s%> with them when he brought them forth <S%H3318><s%> out <S%H3318><s%> of the land <S%H776><s%> of Egypt <S%H4714><s%>,

and went <S%H3212><s%> and served <S%H5647><s%> other <S%H312><s%> gods <S%H430><s%>, and worshipped <S%H7812><s%> them <S%H430><s%>, gods that they knew <S%H3045><s%> not <S%H2505><s%>, and that he had not given unto them:

therefore the anger <S%H639><s%> of Jehovah <S%H3068><s%> was kindled <S%H2734><s%> against this land <S%H776><s%>, to bring <S%H935><s%> upon it all the curse <S%H7045><s%> that is written <S%H3789><s%> in this book <S%H5612><s%>;

and Jehovah <S%H3068><s%> rooted <S%H5428><s%> them out of their land <S%H127><s%> in anger <S%H639><s%>, and in wrath <S%H2534><s%>, and in great <S%H1419><s%> indignation <S%H7110><s%>, and cast <S%H7993><s%> them into another <S%H312><s%> land <S%H776><s%>, as at this day <S%H3117><s%>.

The secret <S%H5641><s%> things belong unto Jehovah <S%H3068><s%> our God <S%H430><s%>; but the things that are revealed <S%H1540><s%> belong unto us and to our children <S%H1121><s%> for <S%H5704><s%> ever <S%H5769><s%>, that we may do <S%H6213><s%> all the words <S%H1697><s%> of this law <S%H8451><s%>.
